body.name: [Electric-Focus] 5G WiFi Bluetooth Projector, TOPTRO TR23 Mini Projector Support 1080P, 15000 Lumen, 4D/4P Keystone& Zoom, Latest Dust-Proof Portable Projector, Outdoor Projector for iOS/Android/PS5
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 39 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 39 mins
features: ❤️【15000 Lumens & Supports Full HD 1080P 】TOPTRO 2024 upgraded version TR23 projector supports 15000 Lumens, 1920 x 1080 resolution, 20000:1 contrast ratio, providing you with vivid, saturated images with outstanding clarity. This projector support 100%-50% zoom, allows you to get the right screen size without frequently adjusting the distance, especially when it is suspended from the ceiling. TR23 portable projector will create the perfect personal home theater for you and your family.

❤️【Electric-Focus & 4D/4P Correction】In order to meet customer needs, the TR23 mini projector has been upgraded with electric focus, just press and hold the focus button to quickly focus the screen to capture a sharp image. Compared with other home projectors, it is more convenient and faster to focus. The 4D/4P correction function allows you to easily adjust all four points and all 4 sides on the projection screen through the remote control, you can adjust the image to a rectangle easily.

❤️【Fully Sealed Optical Machine Design】The TR23 bluetooth projector uses unique craftsmanship to make every detail exude exquisite charm. It breaks the traditional appearance and makes it both fashionable and portable. Adopting a fully sealed optical system that prevents dust pollution on optical components (IP5X certification), Say goodbye to screen yellowing, black dots, and light leakage issues. And the noise is greatly reduced, allowing you to enjoy an immersive home theater experience.

❤️【Ultra-fast 5G/2.4G WiFi & 5.2 Bluetooth】This WiFi projector is equipped with an advanced 5G WiFi chip, which can effectively avoid signal interference. This makes the transmission more stable and faster preventing lag and freezing of the screen during playback. Also, this mini projector includes two built-in speaker and supports the 5.2 Bluetooth function, which allows connection with Bluetooth headsets, Bluetooth speakers, Sound bars, and AirPods without hassle.

❤️【Shocking Stereo Sound & Professional After-Sales】After 5 years of polishing the sound design technology, the customized super large sound cavity has created the TR23 projector's 360-degree stereo surround sound quality. Strong heat dissipation, more stable performance and longer use. TOPTRO provides 1-year money-back guarantee and 3-Year repair, lifetime professional technical support. Any problems, please let us know.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TOPTRO 2024 Upgraded Version TR23 WiFi Bluetooth Projector, Elevate your Home Theater Experience Newly Added Function: 1. 4P/4D Keystone Correction: You can place TR23 mini projector anywhere or at any angle. 2. Electric Focus: Say goodbye to traditional manual focusing wheels, one second focus, more intelligent. 3. Improved dust prevention system: It can more effectively prevent dust from entering without the need to clean the portable projector. 4. Upgrade to WiFi 6 Feature: Faster and more stable connections. Wireless screen mirroring for iOS/Android phones, tablets, and Windows 10 computers.

2024 Updated TR23 portable projector with innovative electronic focusing function Compared to previous versions of TR23, the updated TR23 portable projector has innovative electronic focusing function. Simply press the "F+" and "F -" buttons on the remote control to focus and easily obtain clear videos and images, it is more convenient to operate, focuses faster, and is more accurate.

4P And 4D Keystone Correction, Side Projection is Also Square 2024 Updated TR23 portable projector features 4P&4D trapezoidal correction function. By individually adjusting each corner of the image, TR23 projector's 4-angle adjustment eliminates any skewed or distorted images in deflection angles or confined space installations To get a perfect picture. Let you get rid of the limitations of space and location, you can easily project from any angle, and you can watch movies more freely.

Why do projectors need to be dust-proof? 1. The dust causes the brightness to drop, and the lens will gradually attenuate the color after dust accumulation; 2. The dust enters the optical machine and adheres to the optical components, and black spots appear on the screen; The traditional projector adopts a semi-enclosed optical engine, while the TR23 wifi projector adopts a fully enclosed optical engine, with a sealed surface cover design, a sealed lens, and a sealed light source, so that you can completely get rid of the trouble of black spots, no need to clean the dust, and greatly improve the image stability of the projector.

Future Speed, Say Goodbye to Lag Adopt the latest 5G WiFi chip to provide you with a more stable signal, wider coverage and faster transmission speed, get rid of the trouble of delay, and bring you the ultimate movie viewing experience. Wireless Screen Mirroring, More Freedom TR23 projector supports Android, iOS, Windows system on the same screen, watching movies, watching photos, online classes, playing games, working from home, small screen becomes large screen in one second, enjoy unlimited fun.

Real Bluetooth Projector The TR23 projector adopts a new generation of Bluetooth 5.2 version, the transmission speed is faster and stronger, and it is vertically compatible with lower versions. It is easy to connect your Bluetooth speakers, Bluetooth headphones, Bluetooth sound bar, a real bluetooth projector. And built-in speakers, equipped with virtual 360° all-round surround sound,presenting a strong bass and a shocking sound field. Smart TEMP Control and Low Noise The intelligent temperature control chip precisely adjusts the fan speed according to the brightness and ambient temperature. The wind noise is lower than 40db, and the whole movie watching is quiet and comfortable. It then dissipates heat quickly and efficiently, which can extend the life of the projector. 15,0000 hours light source life, 8 hours a day, it can be used for 15 years, durable. Wide Compatibility The TR23 home theater projector has HDMI/USB/AV/Audio Out 3.5mm interface, you can easily connect with TV Box, Amazon Stick TV, Chromecast, PC, Laptop, Tablet, External Speaker, Game Console, Xbox, DVD Player , Card Reader, U Disk, Media Player, iPad, iPhone, android Smartphone. Powerful compatibility to meet your more needs.

If you are planning an outdoor trip and want to carry a projector, TOPTRO TR23 projector is perfect because it can be held with one hand or in a handbag. For example: Say that you want to bring your projector to a friend’s house for movie night – or maybe you want to do an outdoor screening on a warm summer evening. With the TR23 outdoor projector, all that is possible. Start your beautiful journey now. Note: There is no battery inside the projector, please bring a mobile power device when using it outdoors. Top questions: Q1: I accidentally lost an accessory, what should I do? A: If you accidentally lose accessories, such as remote control, HDMI cable, etc., please let us know, we will reissue for you for free. Q2: Is Netflix/ Prime Video/Hulu supported on this bluetooth projector? A: Due to HDCP copyright, mobile devices cannot mirror the content of some streaming services (Netflix, Amazon, Hulu, etc.), please understand that we have to comply with copyright laws. You can connect your TV stick or Roku Stick with TR23 projector, enjoy over 1 million movies and TV episodes from Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Hulu and so on. Q3: What should I do if there is no sound when the projector is connected to the TV stick? A: When connect the TV stick, please disable Dolby Digital Plus. Select "Settings" on Fire TV stick > Display and Sounds > Audio > Dolby Digital Output > Dolby Digital Plus Off to disable it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small footprint, powerful projection
reviews.reviewText: First projector, so I don't have anything to compare. Based off just this, the set-up was very easy. Plug & play. Placed the projector on a dslr tripod (for ease of leveling unit), & to test run the unit: 1) ran an hdmi from the computer (you tube videos) and 2) Fire Stick. Also purchased a pull down screen, 74".Works best in a darker room, but with the blinds shut, the picture was still fairly clear during the day. Picture quality was impressive. The dial to increase the focus worked well. Again, 1st projector, zero expectations. The picture quality is really based on the quality of the stream (if that's your source). I only stream (amazon, netflix, discovery, u tube), so unable to comment on other modes of video sources. As other reviews mentioned, not as bright as say a smart TV, but I felt it was more like a movie theater atmosphere. Some will like it, others may not.The sound was OK. Not stellar, not the worst. It was not muffled, was able to hear the dialog. The blue tooth matched up instantly to my mini portable speaker, so no issues there. There are sound settings that do help to make it louder than the default.The portability of this unit & ability to do an outdoor movie is a bonus.Overall, for 1st projector, I'm impressed. Small footprint, decent picture quality, easy set-up, and Bluetooth. The Eh? Sound. I recommend Bluetoothing to something better. Unit seems to run hot after about an hour. I did run it for 3 hours straight with no issues, but only time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After researching a lot of projectors and reading reviews, I am so glad I purchased this one! It is very compact, great picture quality, great quality, great price, and easy to work. I am glad I went with this one and cant wait to continue using it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good inexpensive portable projector.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was a little surprised when I opened up the box. Inside was a full color owners manual, HDMI & analog cables and remote. I was also surprised to see that it has a threaded hole in the bottom to mount it to a tripod(tripod was not included, but it will mount on any standard camera tripod). This is also a nice looking projector. It had a carry strap too!. It has nice lite up touch sensitive buttons on the top that operated most functions. The remote is basic, but functional. One thing I will say is that they did a great job with good instructions. As you can see in the pictures, the manual and on screen instructions walked you through every step with setup. After we downloaded the app and setup our Android phone(compatible with Apple as well), we were able to stream directly to the projector with out any issues.Picture quality: We used a Roku 4k HDMI streaming stick, although this projector is not 4k. It has a solid picture at 720p. It did a great job with live streaming. The frame rate was smooth and it didn't seem to have any of the poor choppy frame rates that I've had with other projectors in this price range. It also has decent stereo speakers. Loud enough to get the job done. There's a headphone jack on the back. You could plug in some external powered speakers for better sound. One last note was the fan noise was noticeably quieter than some of the other projectors that I've owned. Good thing! I hate loud fans!All in all, if your looking for an inexpensive portable projector that's easy to setup, this is a solid choice. It would be great for a backyard BBQ, watching a game or setting the kids down in front of it with there favorite show. Note: You will need an external source to plug into this projector (like a Roku or Apple TV) or stream from your phone or tablet. This is just a projector. No tuners or streaming apps built in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Projector, Worth The Money!
reviews.reviewText: Projector does not disappoint, great quality sound, excellent clear projection, and the size of the projector is just right, not too big and not too small. I love that it has a handle for carrying and setting up my devices to connect by Bluetooth is real simple. I definitely recommend purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars IMPORTANT! Copyright law prevents direct streaming from Netflix/Disney+/Prime.
reviews.reviewText: We purchase the projector but we were not aware that we would jot be able to stream directly from our cell phones to the projector. (It was in the description of the product, but we did not read it properly). Also it does not have a built in battery.For everything else, the project has very good quality, good image and a medium size (it is portable but it is not small).We did purchased a second one from the same brand/manufacturer since we really liked the quality , but this time a smart version (with built in Netflix/Disney+/Prime), in a smaller size with built in battery! 👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Projector For Price
reviews.reviewText: Great projector - been using it for a while now and it's my favorite thing. It's very easy to use and the sound quality is really good just from the projector alone. On top of that, the video is very very good. I love it so much I pretty much don't use my tv anymore and just use this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the design and works much better than expected
reviews.reviewText: The design of this projector is just beautiful. Very cool looking and compact. It's great for me since I'm traveling all the time and allows me to take it along easily. I got this project to build my home golf simulation system. It's much better than I had expected, at it's price point. I also use it to watch movies and sports which works amazing. Overall, very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear, easy set up, love the portability
reviews.reviewText: This is my third different projector I have purchased over the years. This is by far the most clear picture, especially from a distance past 8 feet. The lines are crisp, the picture is sharp and the colors are brilliant. The easy set up is one button turn on, and the sound is wonderful from such a compact internal. speaker. Love it!

Le vidéoprojecteur est arrivé avec tous ses équipements soit câble HDMI, télécommande, cache... La livraison est rapide, en deux jours le colis est arrivé.Il a une très bonne qualité pour son prix et la ventilation ne fait pas trop de bruit. La luminosité est assez puissante et fonctionne dans les endroits sombres mais pas nécessairement le noir complet.Mon avis final est que je recommande vivement ce vidéoprojecteur avec une très bonne qualité d'image.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This was gift fir my daughter I wasn't expecting much thinking of the old 80s projectors but this blew my mind the picture quality is perfect and crisp we have used indoors and a few times in the garden using a sheet as a brack drop. Small and lights definitely portable. Has sd slot which is great. Have loved using this product as a family

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent portable projector for the money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Excellent value projector. Incredible for the price. Easy to set up using the very responsive remote control following a very clear instruction manual. And I found navigating through the various sound and video menus very easy. Lots of different options. I plugged in my firestick and was pleasantly surprised at how good the picture is. The small video I shot was taken on a very sunny day with curtains closed and as you can see it is very clear and visible in hd. When switching on the projector you can hear the fan,but once watching something with volume I don't even notice it. Hopefully you can tell from the video. I would recommend this projector without hesitation.

The media could not be loaded. J'ai acheté ce videoprojecteur car il me semblait plus maniable et facile a transporter (notamment en camping) que mon 9000 lumens.Alors les questions que l'on se pose tout le temps sur ce type de produit :-luminosité : largement suffisante jusque luminosité moyenne. En pleine journée en pleine luminosité il est normal que nous ne voyez pas grand chose... C'est un vidéo PROJECTEUR. Si il y a trop de lumière il semble évident que la lumière projetee soit plus difficile a distinguer... Mais rassurez vous. En utilisation "normale" il fait du très bon job.😊-Le bruit : pour avoir eu d'autres videoprojecteurs je le trouve très silencieux. Avec le son vraiment on y fait plus attention.🤗- Ensuite, à savoir si il est natif 1080/720p.. Franchement ... On parle d'un videoprojecteur d'entrée de gamme... Ça sert a rien d'être archi pointilleux! Il lit les 1080p sans PB, l'image est vraiment excellente mais après, voir si c'est en natif ou pas. Ce n'est pas ce qui m'intéresse sur ce type de produit vendu à ce prix perso. Vous pouvez mettre 100/200€ de plus si vous avez certaines exigences dans ce type de produit.En résumé j'ai trouvé tout ce que je cherchais sur ce videoprojecteur.J'ai vraiment apprecie le plastique brossé (contre les marques de doigts et rayures), reglages de l'image complet (zoom, nettete...)et surtout la très bonne qualité d'image et de son.Je vous le recommande sans hésiter.😉En espérant que mon commentaire vous aura été utile 👍

reviews.reviewTitle: Buon proiettore con ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Premetto che avevo già un proiettore più alto di gamma prodotto dalla stessa azienda, che tuttora utilizzo e trovo ottimo.Ho deciso di provare anche questo, date le dimensioni molto più compatte e la praticità della presenza di wi-fi e bluetooth integrati.Come si nota da foto e video, il dispositivo svolge egregiamente il proprio dovere: nonostante le dimensioni ridotte del proiettore, l'immagine è piuttosto nitida sia al centro dello schermo che sui bordi e negli angoli, i colori sono pieni e con mia grande sorpresa anche l'audio integrato, seppur certo non potentissimo, risulta apprezzabile.Molte le regolazioni possibili sia per immagine che audio, presente l'italiano per i menu, comodo e reattivo il telecomando.Utilizzato come si deve, cioè con la giusta dose di buio e alla distanza corretta dal muro, risulta molto gradevole e permetterà a chiunque di crearsi un piccolo angolo cinema ad un costo irrisorio.A proposito: io proietto direttamente sul muro pitturato con normale pittura bianca; certamente utilizzando un telo specifico o verniciando il muro con apposita pittura da proiezione i risultati sarebbero ancora migliori, ma per quanto mi riguarda ritengo la resa già più che buona così.In definitiva lo consiglio.
